medium: Cotton, buttons, metal, coin, paper (?), sequins, shells
title: Head coverning
description: hood-like garment; indigo; small maroon strip at edges, trimmed with chains, buttons and coin; blue embroidered back bottom panel with metallic (now dulled) bands, loops and floral medallions, short orange bands and red cross stitch; blue fringe trimmed in irregular orange and blue balls (paper wads?)
